com.buschmais.xo.api

Interface XOManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XOManagerImpl

    public interface XOManager
extends AutoCloseable
    Defines methods to manage the lifecycle of property instances, query execution and transaction management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  XOManager.MigrationStrategy<T,M>
      Defines the interface of strategies for migration between different composite object types.

    • Method Detail

      • currentTransaction

        XOTransaction currentTransaction()
        Return the XOTransaction associated with the manager.
        Returns:
        The XOTransaction or null if the datastore does not support transactions.

      • validate

        Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<Object>> validate()
        Performs a validation of all managed instances (JSR-303).
        Returns:
        The set of detected constraint violations.

      • findById

        <T,I> T findById(Class<T> type,
                 I id)
        Find an entity or relation using its it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the instance
        I - The type of the id.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the instance.
        id - The id.
        Returns:
        The instance.

      • migrate

        <T,M> CompositeObject migrate(T instance,
                              Class<M> targetType,
                              Class<?>... targetTypes)
        Migrates the type of a property instance to the given target types and returns it. The original instance will not be usable anymore after migration.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The property type.
        M - The migrated property type. Note that it be assignable to at least one of the interfaces specified for types.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance.
        targetType - The target interface which shall be implemented by the migrated instance.
        targetTypes - More target interfaces which shall be implemented by the migrated instance.
        Returns:
        The migrated instance.

      • migrate

        <T,M> M migrate(T instance,
                Class<M> targetType)
        Migrates the type of a property instance to the given target type and returns it. The original instance will not be usable anymore after migration.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The property type.
        M - The migrated property type. Note that it be assignable to at least one of the interfaces specified for types.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance.
        targetType - The target interface which shall be implemented by the migrated instance.
        Returns:
        The migrated instance.

      • migrate

        <T,M> CompositeObject migrate(T instance,
                              XOManager.MigrationStrategy<T,M> migrationStrategy,
                              Class<M> targetType,
                              Class<?>... targetTypes)
        Migrates the type of a property instance to the given target and returns it. The original instance will not be usable anymore after migration.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The property type.
        M - The migrated property type. Note that it be assignable to at least one of the interfaces specified for types.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance.
        migrationStrategy - The XOManager.MigrationStrategy to be used to migrate data (e.g. properties) to the new type.
        targetType - The target interface which shall be implemented by the migrated instance.
        targetTypes - More target interfaces which shall be implemented by the migrated instance.
        Returns:
        The migrated instance.

      • migrate

        <T,M> M migrate(T instance,
                XOManager.MigrationStrategy<T,M> migrationStrategy,
                Class<M> targetType)
        Migrates the type of a property instance to the given target and returns it. The original instance will not be usable anymore after migration.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The property type.
        M - The migrated property type. Note that it be assignable to at least one of the interfaces specified for types.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance.
        migrationStrategy - The XOManager.MigrationStrategy to be used to migrate data (e.g. properties) to the target type.
        targetType - The target interface which shall be implemented by the migrated instance.
        Returns:
        The migrated instance.
